pill_place_base.description: Base reward applied to the first pill lock; later locks scale via the exponential curve.

pill_place_growth.description: Per-placement growth rate (a) for the quadratic pill lock reward: reward = base * (1 + a*(n-1)^2).

virus_clear_bonus.description: Total reward for clearing all starting viruses; each cleared virus receives this divided by the initial virus count.

non_virus_clear_bonus.description: Reward applied for clearing non-virus tiles alongside a placement.

terminal_clear_bonus.description: Bonus awarded when the stage is cleared.

topout_penalty.description: Penalty applied if the player tops out.

time_bonus_topout_per_60_frames.description: Additional reward per in-game second elapsed when top-out occurs.

time_penalty_clear_per_60_frames.description: Penalty per in-game second elapsed on successful clears (encourages faster runs).

adjacency_pair_bonus.description: Reward for creating a new adjacent pair alignment that could enable future clears.

adjacency_triplet_bonus.description: Reward for creating a longer adjacency (three aligned segments).

virus_adjacency_pair_bonus.description: Reward for creating a new same-color adjacency with at least one virus involved (stronger than generic adjacency shaping).

virus_adjacency_triplet_bonus.description: Reward for extending a same-color run to length â‰¥3 with at least one virus involved (stronger than generic adjacency shaping).

column_height_penalty.description: Penalty weight applied to tall stacks relative to the virus band.

action_penalty_scale.description: Multiplier for the per-step action penalty relative to the most recent placement bonus.

placement_height_threshold.description: Row gap above the highest remaining virus before a placement is considered too high.

placement_height_penalty_multiplier.description: Multiplier applied to the pill placement bonus when the high-placement penalty is triggered.

punish_high_placements.description: If false, disables the heuristic that penalizes pills locked well above the virus band.
